name: Bar Breaker (itch)
description: Bar Breaker is a turn-based, 2D fighting game for 2 players. Players will fight one-on-one in a drunken brawl with a classic bar setting. Duke it out by throwing fists, chairs, and bottles to be the last one standing. Maintain a safe distance from your opponent’s attacks while getting in close to hit them yourself, and use knockback to control their position, dominate the space, and knock them out cold!
